name: Futtony y el Copón Mundial
description:
Compete in several game modes at the same time:
-- Predictions: Move up in Futtony Liga and Futtony Copa, until you reach the best division.
-- Virtual Trainer: Add experience points and level up, to choose your team and participate in each Continental Copon, try to classify it to compete in the WORLD Copon.
-- Interactive Coach: Unlock this "click" mode by qualifying your team for the big matches for third place and for being Champion of the Copon you play.

Enjoy the game, with its Copon tournaments, its interesting matches, goals, rankings, etc.

Complete kits, museums, winners, etc.

Will any of your players be a golden boot?

Will you win the Copon Mundial with your favorite team?

Beat your records and fill the Hall of Fame!
